lead_paragraph: Much about the music industry has changed in recent years, but at least one thing remains the same: the role of Eminem as a chart-topping star.
snippet: Much about the music industry has changed in recent years, but at least one thing remains the same: the role of Eminem as a chart-topping star.

headline.main: Eminem Tops the Album Chart With Other Artists Far Behind
headline.print_headline: Eminem Tops the Album Chart With Other Artists Far Behind

byline.original: By JOSEPH PLAMBECK; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF
